Text: A stupid Uruguayan movie about a bunch of old timers going to the sea... Can't these people transcend the easy soap-like plots (El banyio del Papa, Whiskey, 25 Watts, etc.) or artsy pretentious nonsense like El dirigible and do something REALLY good like Orfeo negro (Brazilian) or El Exilio de Gardel (Argie)? When will they (if ever) learn to make really good cinema?
